promptName.description: Name of the prompt to retrieve (omit to get all prompts)

includeContent.description: Whether to include the filled prompt content (default: true)

args.description: Arguments to fill in prompt template variables (merged with config defaults)

title: wit-get-prompts
description: Retrieve pre-filled prompt templates by name or list all available prompts. Useful for testing prompt templates or for agents that need direct access to prompt content for specialized use cases.
